description: User accounts. Users must have a valid account in order to access services.
name: Accounts

description.description: Text that describes a user's account.

handle.description: A user's handle (nickname) that is visible to other users.
handle.name: Handle

isLocked.description: Has the user's account been locked? Users with locked accounts are not allowed to sign in.
isLocked.name: Is locked
isLocked.shortDescription: Is the user allowed to sign in?

lastSignedInTime.description: The date and time when the user last signed in to this account
lastSignedInTime.name: Last signed in time
lastSignedInTime.shortDescription: The last day and time of day when this account's user signed in to this account.

mustChangePassword.description: Is a user required to change his password after signing in?
mustChangePassword.name: Must change password
mustChangePassword.shortDescription: Does the user have to change his or her password after signing in?

user.shortDescription: The user who owns an account.
